title: IVR-Based Language Simulation Training: Project-Based Learning in Higher Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and computer literacy
context.additional_context: IVR simulation-based language practice in digital environments to strengthen real-life communication skills.

learning_goals: Learners can perform target language situational dialogues with over 80% accuracy in an IVR environment.
Learners can analyze IVR simulation results and propose improvement directions through PBL team projects.
Learners can independently resolve technical issues occurring in an IVR environment in over 90% of cases.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
